data.text: @sidjustis Sir, this is not the service we intend to provide. We request you to share your PNR via DMso we can check and assist at the earliest. ~Ojasvi
@MuzaffarIqbal21 Sir, this is unfortunate. Did you inform the delivery person regarding the same? Please let us know in detail. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@IndiGo6E Mr Mitra, we believe one of our representatives connected with you and assisted in the best possible way. We are just one DM away if the issue still persists. We wish you a lovely day ahead. ~Ojasvi

data.text: @DelhiIndia2021 Hi, we'd request you to DM us a snapshot of the net banking transaction details displaying the transaction ID, date & time of transaction so we can check & assist you further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@muthu_jegan Hi, you can carry a laptop bag weighing not more than 3 kg along with your hand baggage. ~Ojasvi
@kushanmitra Mr Mitra, we are concerned to see this. Please allow us some time to get this checked and we'll get back to you with an update. ~Ojasvi
@agarwalgarima06 Hi, please DM us your PNR. We'll get this checked with our airport team. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@vaibhav27sharma Mr Sharma, sorry to know your day started on such a note. However, please be informed, check-in counter closes 60 mins & boarding gate closes 25 mins prior to departure. Further, please DM your PNR for us to take a closer look. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Hash26361028 Yes, Sir. You may carry the same, however, please make sure it won't exceed the hand baggage limit and is carried in a soft case. ~Ojasvi
@raunakmodi Sir, please be informed, the check-in counter closes 60 mins prior to the domestic departure & 75 mins prior to the international departure. We hope this clarifies. ~Ojasvi

@imagine_power Hi, sorry to note your experience. Please be informed, check-in counter closes 60 mins & boarding gate closes 25 mins prior to departure. Reporting beyond the closure time can lead to boarding denial. Further, please DM your PNR for us to take a closer look. ~Linda

data.text: @purvasohani Ms Sohani, RTPCR is usually not mandatory for travelers who are not fully vaccinated. We request you to visit the link https://t.co/FOlyPq3m1O for more details on state-wise regulations. ~Ojasvi
@utdmu20 Hi, sorry to find you disappointed. Your feedback is duly noted for future enhancements. Hope to serve you better in the future. ~Linda

data.text: @arunpandian199 Sir, this is not the kind of experience we wish our customers' to have. Could you please help us with the PNR via DM? We'll have a closer look into it. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@6e_SG_G8_UK_AI Sir, please check your DM. Thanks! ~Sheetal
@erishabh Wish you a hassle-free journey ahead, Mr Mehrotra.😊 ~Sheetal
@AnishSh78143740 We truly regret to know about the hassle. We'll get this checked on priority, please drop your PNR on our DM. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@erishabh Mr Mehrotra, we truly regret the inconvenience caused to you. While we would like to assist you with this, please share a convenient time with us via DM so we may connect you on your registered mobile number. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@Utpal__Kant Mr Kant, we would really like to assist you here, however, we see that only emergency exit seats are available as of now. Since you have selected auto-seat assignment, please know that the seat will be assigned to you as per availability. ~Sheetal

@Aksh27Aksh Mr Bhardwaj, we truly regret to see your discomfort. You may always reach out to our crew to adjust the temperature, however, we are also sharing the feedback with the concerned team for necessary review on this. ~Sheetal

data.text:
@MichelleSfernz Ms Fernandes, you may visit the "Edit Booking" link here https://t.co/nKOUIVJOiv and book it under the 'Add snacks/bags' tab. Hope we're helpful to you. Please feel free to connect if you need any other assistance. ~ Sheetal
  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

data.text: @drdebduttab Mr Bhattachraya, we understand your concern here. However, please be informed that you are required to carry a copy of your card at the airport on the day of travel from which the booking has been done. Hope this clarifies, ~Sheetal
@6e_SG_G8_UK_AI Sir, we can surely get this checked and update you at the earliest. Please share the flight details or your PNR via DM. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@Mainagulati Ms Gulati, please DM us the PNR & contact number along with a good time to connect with you over the call. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@LittleB33725137 Hi, our intention is always to provide a hassle-free service to all our customers. Please DM your PNR for us to take a closer look. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@parveshgoyal303 Mr Goyal, we would request you to revert to the same email so that our team may assist you further. ~Prabh

data.text:
@HassanRaihan4 Sir, all customers travelling with a single name on passport on residence/employment visa shall be allowed to travel. However,
all customers travelling with a single name on passport on tourist/visit visa or any other visa shall not be allowed to travel. ~Linda
@Ramaswami2016 Sir, sorry to find you disappointed. Please DM us your concern a bit more in detail along with the PNR so we can assist you further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

urls.title: Change your flight in easy steps - IndiGo
urls.description: Change your IndiGo flight with the step by step guide to flight change. Know the flight change charges for domestic and international bookings, at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @murali_64 Sir, you may visit https://t.co/LV1tIKa6Es to reschedule your booking, however, charges will for rescheduling a confirmed booking will be applicable. ~Prabh
@risabhjn Mr Jain, we regret to know this. Please DM us your PNR so we may look into it. ~Prabh   https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@jena5_sonukumar Sir, please allow us a while to check and get back. ~Shreya

@InVideogame Sir, we do our best to keep the aircraft insect-free by regularly spraying disinfectants. However, hope you would understand that the entry of insects cannot be guarded against completely. We've duly noted your feedback, please DM us the PNR. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@KaviKavi140494 As you reported late so our staff was unable to accept you on the same flight. We believe our team assisted you with the flight re-accommodation to the next available flight and sincerely look forward to your understanding. ~Prabh  2/2

@KaviKavi140494 Mr Kaviarasan, we regret such an experience. The boarding gate closes 25 mins prior to the flight departure and as checked, you reported at 2011 hrs for a flight scheduled to depart at 2025 hrs. 1/2
@Ubisyed121 Sir, we confirm that the information you have provided does not belong to IndiGo. You may apply on our official Careers page for a suitable position a https://t.co/hUdEntByTU. ~Shreya
@sandeep925 Sir, please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@kochattil However, we assure you that we'll certainly share your feedback with our Airport team in order to mitigate such delays and be quicker in future. Thank you for speaking with us tonight and hope to welcome you back for a more favourable experience again soon. ~Prabh   2/2

@kochattil Mr Kochattil, we truly understand how frustrating it is to wait for your bags. While our goal is to have all bags off the plane as soon as possible, sometimes delays occur due to unexpected challenges. 1/2

@nikhilbds Please know every corner of the airport is under strict surveillance. We understand this shouldn't have happened therefore, we shall share your feedback with the baggage handling team to be more careful. We look forward to another opportunity to serve you better. ~Linda (2/2)

@nikhilbds Mr Srivastava, we understand the compensation offered to you cannot compensate for the experience you've had. However, this must have occurred during the loading & offloading of the baggage & is completely unintentional. (1/2)

@chinteshk Mr Kumar, we regret the experience and request you to DM us your PNR so we may have your feedback shared with our Concerned Team for further review and to avoid any re-occurrence. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@jalajgaba4 Sir, we believe our Customer Care team has called to address your concern in this regard. ~Linda
@S_Dhatwalia Hi, you are allowed to carry the same in your Check-In Luggage, provided, the batteries need to be carried in the Hand Luggage. ~Navi
@TweetGauravG Mr Gupta, our team has called on the registered number & has had a word with the customer. ~Linda
@SPervezM Feel free to DM us for further assistance. ~Linda (2/2)  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@SPervezM Mr Pervez, we regret to learn about your recent experience. While we ensure to deliver the bag in intact condition, this was not intended. However, we're afraid we won't be able to offer other than what has been communicated over the Phone. (1/2)
@ShaikhAsfaquz Mr Zaman, we regret the inconvenience and have noted your feedback. Wishing you a comfortable time onboard our flight. ~Navi

@prohra1 Mr Rohra, we regret the inconvenience and are checking on the same with our Concerned Teams. Please allow us some time and you may get in touch with us via DM for further communication. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@IndiGo6E In case you face any issues, please let us know about the same via DM along with your PNR, so we may check and assist you. Thanks. (2/2) ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@ShahuSuryawans3 Mr Suryawanshi, in case you don't wish to pay for the seats, you may always do 'Auto Assign Check-In' and the boarding pass will be sent to you with the auto-assigned seat number, 12-6 hours prior of the flight departure time. (1/2)
@agg_manish04 Mr Aggarwal, we understand your concern and request you to contact us within 48 to 24 hrs of the flight departure time so we may assist you in the best possible way. Thanks. ~Navi
@rajbwithu Mr Singh, we regret to note this and are checking on the same. You may also get in touch with our Airport Team for any real-time assistance. Thanks. ~Navi
@SchwarzBrudder Hi, we understand your concern. However, we're not offering any waiver currently. We look forward to your understanding. ~Linda
@sindoor227 Please DM the contact number so we may connect to assist. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@mads_p632 Hi, we are here to assist you. Please DM us your concern/ query along with your contact number so we may check. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@Anjell485 Yes, you can take it in check-in baggage. Thanks! ~Shreya
@DelhiIndia2021 Hi, please be informed, the transaction was declined. We'd request you to check with your bank for further clarification. ~Linda
@imAkshayB Sir, our team will be contacting you at the earliest. ~Shreya
@karan79965073 Sir, we regret the delay. Please DM us your PNR so we may look into it. ~Prabh   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@sushant61887417 Sir, we've replied to your DM. You may check. ~Prabh
@ankurktrSG Mr Katiyar, please allow us some time to check on this and we'll get back to you. Requesting your patience on the same. Thanks. ~Navi
@Vimal72 Dr Hemani, we regret to know this. Please DM us your query in detail along with your PNR so we may assist you with it. ~Prabh   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@Imniravana Mr Sharma, we understand how discomforting missing a flight can be. We believe our team spoke with you in this regard. Your late reporting was the only reason our staff was not able to accept you on the same flight. We look forward to your understanding. ~Prabh
@KennySingh Mr Singh, we have replied to your DM and request you to kindly check on the same. Thanks. ~Navi
@mahirah_zubair Hi, thank you for the shout-out! Your kudos will be shared with Vishnu. 💙 ~Linda
@KGyaan Congratulations to you! Please carry the same in your Check-In Luggage. Thanks. ~Navi
@Amandinho123 Mr Singh, we request you to share your PNR and Contact Number via DM so we may connect with you to assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@sachinshengale4 Mr Shengale, we request you to allow us some time to check on the same and we'll try to update you ASAP. You may also DM us for further communication. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@jbose84 Mr Bose, we regret the inconvenience and request you to allow us some time to check on the same. We'll try to update you ASAP and you may also DM us for further communication. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

data.text: @chetanThakur7 Mr Thakur, we regret the inconvenience and believe that our Customer Experience Team is assisting you in regards to your raised concern. We request your patience and they will update you soon. Thanks. ~Navi
@iammj9 Hi, we see our Airport Team was able to assist you with the Check-In Process. Wishing you a comfortable time in the skies. ~Navi

@pankajkatyal01 Mr Katyal, we regret the experience and are checking on the same with our concerned Airport Team. Please allow us some time and you may also DM us for further communication. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@abhinavpushpam Mr Pushpam, we are always here to assist you. Wishing you a speedy recovery and looking forward to having you onboard soon. ~Navi

@meenal12320192 We appreciate you letting us know of the same and request you to DM us your PNR, so we may have your feedback shared with Aamil. Wishing you a comfortable time in the sky. 💙 #goIndiGo ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@WaniUzAiR3 Hi, we thank you for the #Shoutout and hope that you are doing fine now. We'll have your feedback shared with Aamil and wish you a comfortable time onboard our flight. 💙 #goIndiGo ~Navi
@PreronaDey10 We'll check and get back. ~Shreya
@mukeshbhargava2 Mr Bhargava, we'd like to look into this and request you to DM us your PNR and concern in detail so we may check and assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

data.text: @imraghavgoenka Mr Goenka, customers are allowed to carry up to 5 litres of Liquor to/ from a Dry State in their Check-In Luggage. We request to you visit 'Carriage of Alcoholic beverages' at https://t.co/tDEfGzIsU6 for more information. Thanks. ~Navi

@SinglaYatin Mr Singla, we're concerned to learn about your experience. We assure you that the Safety of our customers and crew is paramount to us and our pilots are well-trained for all such circumstances. However, we are sharing your feedback internally for review. ~Snigdha
